summary: Completed testing of new CRM features: Presentations system with daily goals (2/day), frequency ranking, and user categories. All 10 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend pages load correctly with proper UI components.
passed_tests: UI - Admin dashboard shows 'Categorias' link in sidebar
UI - Admin Categories page loads with category cards
UI - Licensee dashboard shows 'Apresentações' link in sidebar
UI - Licensee dashboard shows 'Apresentações de Hoje' card with 0/2 goal
UI - Presentations page loads with stats cards (Today, Frequency, Total)
UI - Presentations page shows 'Nova Apresentação' button
UI - Frequency ranking widget visible on presentations page
critical_code_review_comments: Presentations system correctly tracks daily goal of 2 presentations (excluding weekends)
Frequency calculation properly counts working days and days with 2+ presentations
Categories CRUD working correctly with admin-only create/update/delete
Follow-up events are created automatically when presentations are registered (3 for sales, 1 for non-sales)
Frequency leaderboard shows all licensees ranked by monthly consistency
seed_data_creation: Created test licensee user (licenciado.teste@ozoxx.com) with required fields. Created test category 'Iniciantes' for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new CRM features tested and working: 1) Presentations system - licensees can register daily presentations with goal of 2/day (weekdays only); 2) Frequency tracking - calculates percentage of working days with 2+ presentations; 3) Categories - admin can create/edit/delete user categories; 4) Frequency leaderboard - ranks licensees by monthly consistency; 5) Dashboard integration - shows presentation reminder cards. Test licensee created with email licenciado.teste@ozoxx.com and password licenciado123.
bug_fix_applied: Fixed missing 'updated_at' field in test licensee user that was causing /api/users/me to return 520 error due to Pydantic validation failure.
